name: Wireless Headphones X1
description: Over-ear wireless headphones with active noise canceling and up to 30 hours battery life.

name: Smart Watch Active
description: Lightweight smartwatch with heart-rate tracking, sleep insights, and 5-day battery.

name: Mechanical Keyboard Pro
description: Compact mechanical keyboard with tactile switches, RGB backlight, and hot-swap support.

name: Portable Speaker Mini
description: Pocket-size Bluetooth speaker with rich bass, IPX7 water resistance, and 12-hour playback.

name: 4K Webcam Ultra
description: 4K USB webcam with auto-focus, dual microphones, and low-light correction for calls.

name: USB-C Hub 8-in-1
description: 8-in-1 aluminum USB-C hub with HDMI, card readers, PD charging, and multiple USB ports.
